entry.title: Core Principles
entry.summary: Our vision is to provide the tools needed for building incredible travel products.
entry.content:
Our vision is to provide the tools needed for building incredible travel products.

From a Anthane's perspective, Core aims to bring order and consistency to Kiwi.com products and the processes behind building them. We elevate the user experience and increase the speed and efficiency of how we design and build products.

entry.title: Accessibility
entry.summary: We build Core to ensure all users have the most pleasant experience possible, with basic accessibility support automatically in your project by following the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.
entry.content: We build Core to ensure all users have the most pleasant experience possible, with basic accessibility support automatically in your project by following the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.
